title: Cox's Bazar
description: Cox's Bazar is a breathtaking destination with the longest natural sea beach in the world. Enjoy the sun, sea, and sand in this coastal paradise.

title: Sreemangal
description: Sreemangal is known as the 'Land of Two Leaves and a Bud' due to its lush tea gardens. Immerse yourself in the serene beauty of this tea haven.

title: Sundarban
description: Sundarban is a UNESCO World Heritage Site and the largest mangrove forest in the world. Explore its unique wildlife and natural wonders.
